thread.title: First Dates is looking for background daters and they'll pay you | Metro News
thread.title_full: First Dates is looking for background daters and they'll pay you | Metro News

author: Hannah Lawrence For Metro.Co.Uk
title: First Dates is looking for background daters and they'll pay you | Metro News
text:
Hannah Lawrence for Metro.co.uk Thursday 23 Feb 2017 10:29 am Fancy a bit-part in First Dates as a background dater? (Picture: Channel 4) 
Singles looking for love but too shy to take a lead role on First Dates have no fear, because you can now take a backseat role in the show while still potentially finding ‘the one’. 
First Dates is looking for background daters to feature in the, er, background of the show. 
And the best thing about the whole deal? They’ll give you money in return! They’ll give you money to appear on First Dates? Pull the other one (Picture: Channel 4) 
The advert reads: ‘Calling couples and singles – would you like to be on a background date in the First Dates restaurant? 
‘Channel 4’s First Dates is returning and looking for couples and singles to come on as background daters in the First Dates restaurant. 
‘You don’t be the main feature but you may appear in an episode and experience where the magic happens.’ Fred wants you to join the show (Picture: Twenty Twenty) 
Twenty Twenty TV, the production company behind the show, are advertising for people over the age of 18 who want to go on a date in the First Dates restaurant. 
The offer is open to singles and couples – basically any pair who want to come on a date and take on a bit-part in the programme.
